title: How to Eat a Buffalo Wing in One Bite
description:
Think wings are messy? Let Greg show you how to take one down in one bite in just a few seconds.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Follow Greg on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Get other Greg Vlogs here: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOlEpGVXWUVuaj1jfPjoxFWh7vfK29UOe

Catch stuff like this via the #AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody it's me Greg Miller from the internet a conversation with Colin IGN and stuff a whole bunch of Internet things you probably see me but a lot of people known me for being the biggest chicken wing Enthusiast they know uh I lead team bone very proudly but here's the thing a lot of people think I eat chicken wings a weird way they say you know eat chicken wings get your hands all dirty I can show you how to eat a chicken wing really quickly at least these little guys right the part that you would think are not the chicken wing or are the chicken wing or however you want to do it now that one's actually broken at the top so we're going to do it but what you want to do is get a real good grasp right right there at the bottom right now here it is so I'm trying to show you in slow motion how it would go but you grab down there you get both pieces of bones in your hand and you go like that just down to Bones like a cat in a cartoon eating the fish you know I no that's it so
